title: When The Gift Becomes A Prison
description: How are you handling the gifts God’s given you? In “When The Gift Becomes A Prison,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals how Jesus broke from tradition to show us how to live in His truth.
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: How are you handling the gifts God’s given you? In “When The Gift Becomes A Prison,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals how Jesus broke from tradition to show us how to live in His truth.
